segments.text: I'm not certain . Do you know ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: America was discovered by Christopher Columbus in 1492 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In a way that's right . But the Vikings travelled there long beforeColumbus . And what about the Red Indians ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . Ask me a question now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Who invented the electric light bulb ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's easy . It was invented by Edison .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Correct . Now for a harder question . Who will be the first men on Mars ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can't answer that . But I think Mars will be visited by men before theed of this century .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . What is the nearest planet to the sun ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's easy . It's .. er . Venus . NO . Pluto . No . Wait a minute . It's Anthe tip of my tongue . Oh dear , what is the nearest planet to the sun ?
